parameter.name: externalRegionsJSON
parameter.label: External Regions
parameter.description: External region definition received from tracker

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: Primary location name. This location uses the coordinates defined at System/Regional settings.

parameter.name: location
parameter.label: Location
parameter.description: This is read-only here. To change the primary location edit the System/Regional Settings.

parameter.name: triggerEvent
parameter.label: Use Trigger Events
parameter.description: If set to TRUE entering and leaving the location will trigger an event instead of switching ON/OFF the region switch.

parameter.name: additionalRegionsJSON
parameter.label: Additional Regions
parameter.description: JSON object containing monitored regions definitions.
